head.supplied: VICTORIA HOUSE, ¶ 27, GREAT BOURKE STREET, MELBOURNE. ¶ Bot ¶ of ¶ BUCKLEY & NUNN, ¶ GENERAL DRAPERS AND SILK MERCERS. ¶ STRAW BONNETS AND MILLINERY....

div.p: P67/474, unit 381, VPRS 3991 inward registered correspondence, VA 475 Chief Secretary's Office, Public Record Office, Victoria.

p.style: font-family: Geneva; margin-left: 0.3335in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: -0.3335in; font-size: 9pt;

note.p: MS is annotated 'No 19' of 74 receipts covering materials supplied from the Botanic Garden for the Intercolonial Exhibition of Australasia, Melbourne, 1866-7, for which M was one of the Commissioners. The expense involved, for ‘Lining for back of fruitcase’, is among those on a list in the same file headed ‘Expenditure incurred by Dr F. Mueller for and on behalf of the Royal Commissioners for the Intercolonial Exhibition, Melbourne’. MS is filed with other MSS dated October 1866.
